snippet.title: Making a game for the Playdate
snippet.description:
Finally got my Playdate! Check out my devlog of this past week of progress as I make a fast paced game for the Playdate where you control a giant laser to launch yourself and dodge obstacles as an effort to escape the complex you're trapped in.

Support me on Patreon! Patrons get early access to this game and the source codes for my games: https://www.patreon.com/squidgoddev

Last Wii Tanks clone devlog: https://youtu.be/vBSrLdKsdiI

Roguelike devlog: https://youtu.be/v9YBJCAa3EQ
Roguelike download: https://squidgod.itch.io/untitled-roguelike

Pulpcraft devlog: https://youtu.be/_Z1zlLM1PT4
Pulpcraft download: https://squidgod.itch.io/pulpcraft

Join my Discord (I'm very active!): https://discord.gg/kDM8RU4aFt
Follow me on Twitter (See what I'm working on early): https://twitter.com/SquidGodDev

Music/SFX from Epidemic Sound. Support the channel and get a month free with my link! https://share.epidemicsound.com/njknzw

#Playdate #PlaydateDev #PlaydateConsole
